mapper.update: update YearPrice set Unitprice=#{unitprice},StartDate=#{startDate}, EndDate=#{endDate},PriceDesc=#{pricedesc} where FeeYear=#{feeyear}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.*,c.* from YearPrice a left outer join FeeItemYearPrice b on a.FeeYear=b.FeeYear left outer join FeeItem c on b.ItemNo=c.ItemNo
